com.facebook.buck.testutil

Class TestConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.util.Console
      • com.facebook.buck.testutil.TestConsole

  • public class TestConsole
extends Console
    Implementation of Console to use in unit tests. Avoids the side-effect of writing to actual System.out or System.err, and makes it possible to inspect what was written to either stream after the fact.
